name: The Founding of Baldi
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to the founding of Baldi! My first ever decompile project! I feel very proud to be typing this and I hope you enjoy checking out my first ever decompile! I'm a noob so don't be too harsh on me! I will make more updates to it, but enjoy it how it looks rn! I don't know what the future holds for this project but I will make more updates to it, I might even expand the map! At this point in time the map is broken in some aspects, but I will fix it! I also gave some of the characters new voices (like filename2). (I tried my best!) More updates definitely coming soon!

Special Thanks to:

  • Splinta and Punkred - Decompile help 
  • Punkred - Baldi renders used 
  • Splinta - Baldi model used 
  • MTM101 - OSB Project
